text: The 2024 FIFA Puskás Award was the sixteenth FIFA Puskás Award. It was awarded on December 17, 2024, during the The Best FIFA Football Awards 2024. The 11 nominees was announced by FIFA on November 28, 2024. Manchester United winger Alejandro Garnacho won the award with 26 points. Uganda's Denis Omedi's goal finished the run in the race as number three in the awards . title: 2024 FIFA Puskás Award
